heading: HB02647
0: AN ACT MANDATING THE INCLUSION OF ELECTED AND APPOINTED BARANGAY OFFICIALS AS COMPULSORY MEMBERS OF THE GOVERNMENT SERVICE INSURANCE SYSTEM, AMENDING FOR THE PURPOSE PRESIDENTIAL DECREE NO. 1146, AS AMENDED, OTHERWISE KNOWN AS THE 'REVISED GOVERNMENT SERVICE INSURANCE ACT OF 1977'
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB02647
FULL TITLE : AN ACT MANDATING THE INCLUSION OF ELECTED AND APPOINTED BARANGAY OFFICIALS AS COMPULSORY MEMBERS OF THE GOVERNMENT SERVICE INSURANCE SYSTEM, AMENDING FOR THE PURPOSE PRESIDENTIAL DECREE NO. 1146, AS AMENDED, OTHERWISE KNOWN AS THE 'REVISED GOVERNMENT SERVICE INSURANCE ACT OF 1977'
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : GATCHALIAN, WES
DATE FILED : 2016-08-08
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
NATURE : Reform
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE
COMMITEE HEARINGS/ACTIONS:
      1. Deliberated upon by the Mother Committee on 2017-03-17
          -Creation of TWG on proposal to grant social security to barangay officials, chaired by Rep. Sharkee Palma
      2. Deliberated by the TWG on 2017-10-12
          -1st TWG on measures proposing to grant social security to barangay officials, chaired by Rep. Palma
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON GOVERNMENT ENTERPRISES AND PRIVATIZATION ON 2016-08-15
